product_name: Hiking Trails of Southwestern Colorado - 4th Edition
long_description: This book is your launch pad to southwestern Colorado's hiking paradise-a must-have for residents and visitors alike! Authors: Paul Pixler and John Peel. Softcover; 338 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Pruett Publishing Company; 2006. From excursions on the city trails of Durango to exploring the Colorado Trail, this is one of the most comprehensive guides to southwest Colorado. Includes 70 trips of varying length with corresponding maps, which provide alternative trail access and updated routes. Also features directions on how to conquer seven of Colorado's 14,000-ft. peaks.
short_description: This book is your launch pad to southwestern Colorado's hiking paradise-a must-have for residents and visitors alike!
